post-update-cmd: echo [WARNING] Delete all .git, examples, docs dirs
rm -rf vendor/**/**/.git vendor/**/**/docs vendor/**/**/examples vendor/**/**/testbench vendor/**/**/example*
post-install-cmd: echo [WARNING] Delete all .git, examples, docs dirs
rm -rf vendor/**/**/.git vendor/**/**/docs vendor/**/**/examples vendor/**/**/testbench vendor/**/**/example*
